From Sample to Results Our Process Explained

01. Visit or Request a Test

Patients and healthcare providers can visit our laboratory or contact us to schedule diagnostic tests including blood tests, hormonal profiles, and PCR testing.

02. Sample Collection

For added convenience, choose our home collection option qualified visit to collect samples safely

03. Analysis and Review

Our skilled pathologists and lab scientists analyze the test data with the latest

04. Follow-Up and Support

Our customer support team is here to answer any questions results, next steps, or any additional testing
